content:
PeerChangeType Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of change that occurred for a peer.

In this Article

public enum PeerChangeType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
PeerChangeType

Fields

Added

A peer object, endpoint or application has been added.
Deleted

A peer object, endpoint or application has been deleted.
Updated

A peer object, endpoint or application has been updated.
